attributes.action: Introduce Inflation measurement for bare essentials
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Current CPI and RPI measurements take into account the luxury goods (i.e. electrical goods) that are not standard purchases for many people and often have a heavy downward pressure and thus do not show the real inflation.

I suggest a third inflation measurement be introduced that includes the bare essentials i.e. food and transport.  

This would fairly indicate people living cost changes and where action may be required.
